mapper.select: select left(sidoCode,2) sidoCode, sidoName from sidocode order by sidoCode
select gugunCode, gugunName from guguncode where gugunName = #{gugun} and gugunCode like concat((select left(sidoCode, 2) from sidocode where sidoName = #{sido}),'%');
select left(gugunCode,5) gugunCode, gugunName from guguncode where left(gugunCode,2) = #{sido} order by gugunCode
select distinct dongName, dongCode from baseaddress where left(dongCode, 5) = #{gugun} order by dongName

select h.aptCode, h.apartmentName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dong, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, (select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)) recentPrice from houseinfo h left join sidocode si on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongcode,5) = left(gu.guguncode,5) where dongCode = #{dong} order by apartmentName;
select * from houseinfo where (lat between #{lat1} and #{lat2}) and (lng between #{lng1} and #{lng2});
select * from baseaddress where (gugunName is null and dongName is null) and (lat between #{lat1} and #{lat2}) and (lng between #{lng1} and #{lng2})
select * from baseaddress where (gugunName is not null and dongName is null) and (lat between #{lat1} and #{lat2}) and (lng between #{lng1} and #{lng2})
select * from baseaddress where (gugunName is not null and dongName is not null) and (lat between #{lat1} and #{lat2}) and (lng between #{lng1} and #{lng2})

select dc.dongName,SUBSTRING_INDEX(avg(cast(d.dealAmount AS SIGNED)),".",1)/10 amountAvg, dc.lng, dc.lat from housedeal d join houseinfo h on h.aptCode = d.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode) join baseaddress dc on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(dc.dongCode,2) and dc.lng BETWEEN #{lng1} and #{lng2} and dc.lat BETWEEN #{lat1} and #{lat2} and dc.sidoName is not null and dc.gugunName is null and dc.dongName is null group by dc.sidoName;

select dc.gugunName,SUBSTRING_INDEX(avg(cast(d.dealAmount AS SIGNED)),".",1)/10 amountAvg, dc.lng, dc.lat from housedeal d join houseinfo h on h.aptCode = d.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode) join baseaddress dc on left(h.dongcode,5) = left(dc.dongCode,5) and dc.lng BETWEEN #{lng1} and #{lng2} and dc.lat BETWEEN #{lat1} and #{lat2} and dc.gugunName is not null and dc.dongName is null group by dc.gugunName;

select dc.dongName,SUBSTRING_INDEX(avg(cast(d.dealAmount AS SIGNED)),".",1)/10 amountAvg, dc.lng, dc.lat from housedeal d join houseinfo h on h.aptCode = d.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode) join baseaddress dc on h.dongcode = dc.dongCode and dc.lng BETWEEN #{lng1} and #{lng2} and dc.lat BETWEEN #{lat1} and #{lat2} and dc.dongName is not null group by dc.dongName;
